title: Beautiful apartment for sale in Colombo 6
location: Rajawatta Terrace, Galle Road, Colombo 6 , Colombo 6
details:
Newly built - 5 balconies - Garage parking for 1 vehicle - Rooftop terrace - Maids quarters - Hot water - CCTV cameras - 24 hour security - Elevator - Generator - Tiled floors - Swimming pool

Description
This stylish apartment has great ventilation which creates a comforting and welcoming atmosphere throughout the homes, while having a well-lit interior during the day because of wide glass windows. It has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 5 balconies, maid’s quarters and an office room. The neighborhood is highly residential meaning there’s additional security apart from the CCTV cameras and 24-hour security, but the area also very quiet. The rooftop terraces and swimming pool are a great way to host social gatherings, especially with the inviting environment. Colombo 6 has direct routes to many popular areas like Dehiwala, Pamankada, Havelock Town, Colombo 3 and Colombo 7. Banks (BOC, NTB, NSB, NDB, DFCC, HSBC, Seylan Bank, Commercial bank, Peoples bank, Pan Asia bank), super markets (Keells Super, Laugfs, Cargills food city, Arpico Super Center), hospitals (Durdens Hospitals, Healthy Life clinic), restaurants, cafés and bars are abundant throughout the area. Buses, trains, tuktuks and other forms of transport are never too far away, thus making it an even more convenient location to move to.
